Hello! How can I assist you today with Abhi's services?
How do i withdraw my salary using abhi

Using Abhi to withdraw a portion of your earned salary is quite straightforward. Here's a step-by-step guide on how to do so:

Step 1: Download the Abhi App on your smartphone from the App Store or Google Play Store.

Step 2: Open the app and log in using your CNIC Number (National Identity Card number).

Step 3: Once logged in, you'll be able to see your available balance on the home screen.

Step 4: Click on the option "Nikalo Abhi" to access the amount you'd like to withdraw from your earned salary.

Step 5: Enter the amount you require and select the bank account where you want the amount to be transferred.

Step 6: Verify your details, and if everything looks correct, confirm the transaction.

Step 7: The amount will be transferred into your account within 30 seconds.

Please ensure your company is already onboarded with Abhi and you're added to the system by your employer to use the service. If not, you may need to talk to your HR department to get set up. Remember, you can access up to 50% of your earned salary before your usual payday. If you encounter any issues or have any further questions, do not hesitate to ask here or reach out to Abhi's customer support for assistance.
Thanks. Can i take out more than 50% of my salary using abhi?

No, you cannot withdraw more than 50% of your earned salary using Abhi. The platform allows you to access up to 50% of your earned but unpaid salary. This policy is in place to ensure that you have a portion of your salary remaining for your regular payday, helping to maintain financial stability and to prevent over-reliance on advance salary access. If you require more than what's available through Abhi, you may want to discuss alternative options with your HR department or look into other financial services.
Kia paisay mjhe foran miljaenge?

جی ہاں، جب آپ ابھی کا استعمال کرکے اپنی کمائی ہوئی تنخواہ کا کچھ حصہ نکالنے کا عمل مکمل کرتے ہیں، تو رقم آپ کے اکاؤنٹ میں تقریباً ۳۰ سیکنڈ کے اندر منتقل کر دی جاتی ہے۔ یہ سہولت آپ کو فوری طور پر مالی مدد فراہم کرنے کے لئے ہے تاکہ آپ کسی بھی غیر متوقع مالی ضروریات کا سامنا کر سکیں۔ بس صرف یہ یقینی بنائیں کہ آپ کے ادارے نے ابھی کے ساتھ شراکت کی ہو اور آپ کا اکاؤنٹ سسٹم میں شامل ہو۔
Kia mei abhi k customer support se baat kar skta hun?

جی ہاں، آپ ابھی کے کسٹمر سپورٹ سے بات کر سکتے ہیں۔ آپ ان سے ای میل کے ذریعے connect@abhi.com.pk پر رابطہ کر سکتے ہیں یا پھر فون نمبر +923041115276 پر کال کرسکتے ہیں تاکہ آپ کوی نجی معلومات، مدد یا مزید معلومات دی جا سکیں۔

Hello, i have made a transaction right now. I want to know when will i get my funds
Hello, the funds will typically be transferred into your account within 30 seconds after the transaction is confirmed. If you experience any delay, please contact customer support for assistance.
